Articles.Content:
Hi everyone!

My name is Nicolas. I come from France, near Nevers (not far to the center of my country). 

I love aerospace and the idea to create rockets make me very happy (after all, if I can\'t be astronaut...) ^^

Amicalement (Friendly in english), Nico\'

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

Bonjour Nicolas, tu vas adorer les forums.

(Rough translation: 'Hello Nicolas, you are going to love the forums.' Did I get that correct? My French is pretty rusty ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif))

Bienvenu au programme, de Toulouse !!

(welcome to the program, from toulouse)

Thanks everyone! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> Bonjour Nicolas, tu vas adorer les forums.

All is good! ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

Salut! KSP c\'est fantastique. :3c

Rusty French skills, ftw!

Bienvenue! Si vous avez besoin d\'avoir des problÃ¨mes, me PM

English:

Welcome! If you need any have any problems, PM me
